text: Green Meadows is an unincorporated community in Wabash Township, Tippecanoe County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. The community is part of the Lafayette, Indiana Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Geography== Green Meadows is located at with an elevation of 709 feet. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Tippecanoe County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana Category:Lafayette metropolitan area, Indiana
title: Green Meadows, Indiana
